comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Herbert Rodney Perdue (June 7, 1882 in Bethpage, Tennessee - October 31, 1968 in Gallatin, Tennessee), was a professional baseball player who played pitcher in the Major Leagues from 1911-1915. He played for the St. Louis Cardinals and Boston Braves. Also: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5853173868/]
